long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes chrome doesn't catch that you're resetting your password and won't suggest a password for your. This extension will always be at the top for you to grab a new secure password when you need it. It generates a password for you allowing you to specify length, and whether or not to include special numbers and characters. Lastly, there is a copy to clipboard button available.
